title: The Morning
description: Poetry. Whether working within the confines of short poem, or stretching out into a "domestic novel" the poems collected in THE MORNING are a delight. Tracking the minute changes of the everyday with exquisite attention, Snell's eye and ear enliven whatever they touch. This is a poet who, like Reznikoff, dares to write "in the great world small" and knows enough to let things speak for themselves.
author: Roger  Snell
